page.title: 05Ryde - a holiday resort
page.content: In the 1870's a man called{William {Player}decided to make the village of {Lower Ryde}much bigger by making new roads leading to the sea.Then in 1815 came the pier.The pier was improved in the 1840's.Trains came in the 1860's and later trams.Now{Ryde}is a holiday resort.People come on ferries,getting a train from the pier-head,or bringing their car to{Fishbourne.}There are lots of activities apart from swimming in the sea and playing on the beaches.There is the Amusement Arcade, Bowling Green,Crazy Golf,Childrens' Funfair, and{Puck-pool Park.}At {Westridge Leisure Centre} you can go indoor swimming,play snooker,squash, badminton or go in the bar or restaurants.
